Articles.Content:
So, i've seen a lot of SSTO spaceplanes around but not really any rockets, so i decided to make one (if i hadn't, this would've been a pretty pointless post..).

But yeah, as much as i love intricate high-tech spaceships, retro-style rocket ships will always hold a special place in my heart!

I wish i could've added more detail, but weight limitations, you know.

Anyhow, pics:
